text: There are 50 states in the United States of America.
Trenton is the capital of New Jersey.
Chicago, Illinois is referred to the Windy City.
The national anthem is titled the Star Spangled Banner.
We laned on the moon in 1969.
The Grinch put up with the Whos for 53 years.
Benjamin Franklin coined the phrase time is money.
Texas is called the Lone Star State.
There are 17 shots in a fifth.
Thomas Edison was the first person to say hello as a greeting.
